com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPButtonView

java.lang.Object
  Button
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPButtonView
Direct Known Subclasses:
UriButtonView, WPCommandButtonView
public class WPButtonView
extends Button

Simple button with a few states mentioned below.

It is implemented as such because using an xml with selectors and items that correspond to various states causes a display issue when switching both a background and text color. Adapted to support being a part of a WPDialog.

Since:
06-12-2012
